Control Statement: Review IT system change management policies, procedures, standards, practices and related records.  Do they include planning and testing of changes, impact assessments, installation verification checks and fall-back/back-out/reversion procedures, both standard (production and non-production) and emergency changes etc

control_attributes.Clause_Category: 14.2 Security in development and support processes
